vsParam:
Wow, such a massive space-time distortion...
Ah, this is the strange girl you mentioned?

Yeah, exactly.
Let's ask her for some information.

Hey, the little girl over there!
It's dangerous there!

Lycoris! Oh, where on earth is she...
Come back to me...

She just ignores us.
Hey, you. Are you lost? Where are your parents...

Ah... I'm fine and I'm not a kid! But my sister is missing.
I can't go back without my sister...

Eh? You... You look like...
Are you a fairy!?

Hehe, you finally realized that?
Yeah! To be honest, I am a fairy!

Real... Really... I'm a fairy too.
But I'm bigger than you...

Huh? You're a fairy!? But I don't think I ever met you
back in the Fairyland? What... What is going on...

Oh, you came from the Fairyland of Flowers.
But I've never heard of that place...

Um...
My name is Radiata Ambrosia.

My sister is Lycoris Ambrosia.
We came to this world together...

She said, "I'm going to find a way to go back", and then
she just disappeared in the mist over the deadman...

Sigh, you can always run into daredevils in every world...
The, what are you doing here, Radiata?
Um, this flower... is called the Ambrosia Flower...

It started to perish after I came to this world.
So I have to plant it here for it to absorb nourishment.

If it remains like this...
it'll perish even I manage to get back to my world...
If this flower does perish, our hometown will perish too...

What!? Isn't... Isn't it serious?!
[px], can you figure out a solution?

[px]. Maybe we can synthesize nutrients for plants
as it's a flower?

Yeah.
So it's going to be a piece of cake to make nutrients!

The Ambrosia Flower comes with strong magic power.
I don't think average nutrients will work...

Huh, really!? Um... Radiata, do you know
what nutrients will work?
Well, if we use ingredients from our Fairyland...

Yeah... Um, that's not helpful! We don't even know
how to go to your Fairyland!
But we can't just wait here for Lycoris to come back...

Ah... Right, I felt a bit magic power
that belongs to our world in that mist.
Maybe we could find what we need in there...

Let's check it out over there!
Radiata, find a safe place to wait for us.

Oh, um... If Lycoris comes back to find
that I'm not here, she'll get worried.
And I've planted this flower here, so I have to protect it...
So, please let me stay here!

We're not trying to get you out of here,
but what if monsters show up...

Don't worry! The Ambrosias have been responsible for keeping
this flower alive. I can protect myself even if something happens.

Cresson. Let's just trust what she said?
We need to hurry up to find ingredients!

Yeah... We'll be right back. Run away if you come across
any risk that you can't handle, OK?

Got... Got it...
Thank you, everyone!
